lead_paragraph: CANTER--Phyllis L.,mother of Mindy, Robin, Richard and Nelson Canter, mother-in-law of Meredith, Nancy, and Lynn Canter, grandmother of Andrew and Amy Blower, Matt Konowe, Alexander, Kyle, Kevin and Amanda Canter, and great-grandmother of Lana Blower, passed away on February 23rd at the age of 88, in Rye Brook, NY after a long battle with cancer. Phyllis Canter was a Past President of the International Association for Psychiatric Research, Chairman of the Board of the Ranachqua Foundation, which was started by her late husband Arnold Canter, and a former Board Member of the Silliman Fund and Purchase Community Chest. Phyllis enjoyed swimming and snorkeling on coral reefs, was an "A" tennis player at Armonk Tennis Club for decades, a proud supporter of the Performing Arts Center at SUNY Purchase, a volunteer at the Greenwich Hospital Thrift Shop and for many years, a docent at the Bronx Zoo. Phyllis travelled to over 100 countries, enjoyed taking large groups to countries near and far as well as short trips to concerts and museums. Phyllis enjoyed bridge and lunch with her many friends, and most of all, enjoyed time with her loving family. Her gregarious optimistic warmth would always light up a room and her "can do" attitude inspired many others to achieve new heights in their own lives. The funeral will be held on Friday, February 26 at 9:15am at Congregation Emanu-El of Westchester, 2125 Westchester Avenue East, Rye, NY. The family will sit shiva at Congregation Emanu-El of Westchester on Friday from 2:00pm - 7:30pm. Donations in Phyllis's honor may be made to Ranachqua Foundation, Inc., Canter Family Memorial Fund, 1732 Astor Avenue, Bronx, NY 10469. May her memory be a blessing. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CANTER, PHYLLIS L.
